description.ul:
Another day, another release...
This small release brings a FSR version management system, now you can choose betwen the latest FSR DLL (with ML features for RDNA4) or stick to the INT8 version that keeps RDNA2 and 3 compatibility.
Also there's another regression fix catched by @LuanVSO. Thanks dude !
Major Features: FSR4 Variant Management System: Switch between FP8 (latest) and INT8 (4.0.2) variants Automatic folder creation and setup during OptiScaler update User-selectable via dropdown menu Persistent configuration with automatic restoration Bug Fixes: FPS limit offset now correctly handles zero (unlimited) values (PR #222 by @LuanVSO) OBS: Delete your old FGMOD folder and install it again so everything works smoothly
